Accelerate is a strategy and marketing agency located in the heart of NYC. Our goal is to build businesses by making our clients visible and making their customers smile.

Our services

This is a practice site for WordPress Professional Best Practices course which is part of Skillcrush Break Into Tech. In this course, I’ve learned how to use child themes, do advanced theme customizations and do professional deployment and workflow. The blog posts are not created by me. They were provided by Skillcrush for learning purposes. Please visit my portfolio site to see more of my work.

We take pride in our clients and the content we create for them.
